DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : â€¢ To demonstrate administration V503 induce non-inferior Geometric Mean Titers ( GMTs ) ( serum anti-HPV16 anti-HPV18 ) compare GARDASIL . Secondary objective : - To evaluate tolerability V503 9-15 year-old girl . - To summarize humoral immune response ( anti-HPV 6 , 11 , 16 , 18 ) induce V503 GARDASIL .
DOC.criteria: Female 9 15 year old . Good physical health . Known allergy vaccine component . History severe allergic reaction . Thrombocytopenia coagulation disorder would contraindicate intramuscular injection . Pregnant subject . Immunocompromised immunodeficient subject . Splenectomy . Receipt medication / vaccine may interfere study assessment . Fever History positive test HPV , prior receipt HPV vaccine prior participation HPV trial . Any condition might interfere study assessment .
